rows.label: qev092901_SEL0040
rows.name: Ask if she needs any assistance.

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0050
rows.name: Huh? It looks to you like I need help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0070
rows.name:
I mean, I thought humans weren't used to
the whole talking-with-xenos business.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0080
rows.name: Honestly, I never expected one to actively approach me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0090
rows.name: Ah, I hope I didn't offend you there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0100
rows.name:
Say...you're a member of that BLADE
organization, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0110
rows.name:
Hear me out for a moment, would you?
As you guessed, I am in a sort of a bind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0120
rows.name: Thank you. You are a kind soul, aren't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0140
rows.name: Whoa... That's a lot of people.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0150
rows.name:
Hey, do Qlurians really stand out so much?
Our physical features don't seem all that different...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092901_MSG0160
rows.name:
Well, anyway, I don't think any of us
are enjoying this attention much.[ST:wait ]
